mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BBS_TBL WHERE USERID=#{userId} AND SEQ=#{seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE BBS_TBL SET TITLE=#{title}, CONTENT=#{content} WHERE USERID=#{userId} AND SEQ=#{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BBS_TBL(USERID, SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, REGDATE, DIVI) VALUES (#{userId}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ), 0)+1 AS SEQ FROM BBS_TBL WHERE USERID=#{userId}), #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, #{divi})
